basics.name: Luis E. Ascencio Gorozpe
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: Mathematician, Data Scientist and Probability and statistics Phd Candidate with experience in teaching mathematics, programming, probability and statistics in undergraduate and graduate courses. Currently in revision and corrections of Phd thesis and documenting the software created for the research of the project.

work.name: (CIMAT) Centro de Investigación en Matemáticas, A.C.
work.summary: Statistical research in Nonlinear Spaces. Python software development for the estimation of Frechet Mean and statistical trajectories in nonlinear spaces.

work.name: (CIMAT) Centro de Investigación en Matemáticas, A.C.
work.summary: Assisted in the evaluation process and assignment of coursework to master’s program students. Provided support in the instruction of graduate-level courses, including Time Series Analysis, Statistical Inference, Statistical Modeling, and Programming.

work.name: Universidad Autónoma Metropolitana - Iztapalapa
work.summary: Assisted in the evaluation process and assignment of coursework to undergraduate students. Provided support in the instruction of undergraduate-level courses.

publications.name: Zur Elektrody/namik bewegter Körper
publications.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the Michelson–Morley experiment and the properties of light and time. Special relativity incorporates the principle that the speed of light is the same for all inertial observers regardless of the state of motion of the source.

projects.name: Phd Thesis: The Fréchet Mean and Statistics on Riemannian Manifolds
projects.summary: Statistics on Riemannian Manifolds about Depth Measurements, Trajectory Statistics and Dimensional Reduction Techniques.
